description: Shopify is an e-commerce platform that allows businesses to create online stores and sell products.
name: shopify
title: Shopify

actions.description: Adds an order into a Shopify store.
actions.name: createOrder

properties.description: The list of line item objects, each containing information about an item in the order.
properties.name: line_items
properties.label: Line Items

items.description: The list of line item objects, each containing information about an item in the order.

properties.description: How far along an order is in terms line items fulfilled.
properties.name: fulfillment_status
properties.label: Fulfillment Status

properties.description: The weight of the item in grams.
properties.name: grams
properties.label: Grams

properties.description: The price of the item before discounts have been applied in the shop currency.
properties.name: price
properties.label: Price

properties.description: The ID of the product that the line item belongs to.
properties.name: product_id
properties.label: Product Id

properties.description: The ID of the product variant.
properties.name: variant_id
properties.label: Variant Id

properties.description: The number of items that were purchased.
properties.name: quantity
properties.label: Quantity

properties.description: The sum of all the taxes applied to the order in the shop currency. Must be positive.
properties.name: total_tax
properties.label: Total Tax

properties.description: The three-letter code (ISO 4217 format) for the shop currency
properties.name: currency
properties.label: Currency

actions.title: Create an order

actions.description: Deletes an order. Orders that interact with an online gateway can't be deleted.
actions.name: deleteOrder
actions.title: Delete an order

actions.description: Cancels an order. Orders that are paid and have fulfillments can't be canceled.
actions.name: cancelOrder
actions.title: Cancel an order

properties.description: An optional note that a shop owner can attach to the order.
properties.name: note
properties.label: Note

properties.description: The customer's phone number for receiving SMS notifications.
properties.name: phone
properties.label: Phone

properties.description: Tags attached to the order, formatted as a string of comma-separated values.
properties.name: tags
properties.label: Tags

actions.description: Closes an order. A closed order is one that has no more work to be done. All items have been fulfilled or refunded.
actions.name: closeOrder
actions.title: Close an order

triggers.description: Triggers when new order is created.
triggers.name: newOrder
triggers.title: New Order

triggers.description: Triggers when paid order is created.
triggers.name: newPaidOrder
triggers.title: New Paid Order
